name: Space Pirate: New World
description:
Top-down shooter, Plat-former and space game packed into one game. Goal is unlock all items and fly away in your spaceship. Combines different genres and controls and real pirates going into space.

Ship Controls:

mouse left button - move

right mouse button to shoot.

Aim with mouse

Platformer Controls:

WASD - to move

Space to jump

left mouse button - Shoot

Space Controls:

A and D - move 

spacebar - shoot.

Title Art:

vector created by vectorpouch - 

www.freepik.com
